subject: Trades (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In an unusual deal, John Farrell, who was under contract to manage the Blue Jays for another year, was acquired by Boston for shortstop Mike Aviles.
snippet: In an unusual deal, John Farrell, who was under contract to manage the Blue Jays for another year, was acquired by Boston for shortstop Mike Aviles.
